Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 5 Ganthagocchaka » 5.1 Ganthaduka » 5.1.7 Pañhāvāra » 5.1.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Ganthagocchaka
Ganthaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
42.
1713Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe nava…pe…  nasamanantare nava, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye nava (sabbattha nava), namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.
